import React, {useState, useEffect, useContext} from 'react' import {useParams} from 'react-router-dom' import {GlobalState} from '../../../GlobalState' function OrderDetails() { const state = useContext(GlobalState) const [history] = state.userAPI.history const [orderDetails, setOrderDetails] = useState([]) const params = useParams() useEffect(() => { if(params.id) { history.forEach(item => { if(item._id === params.id) setOrderDetails(item) }) } }, [params.id, history]) console.log(orderDetails) if(orderDetails.length === 0 ) return null return (
Name Email Address Phone Number
{orderDetails.name} {orderDetails.email} {orderDetails.address} {orderDetails.phonenumber}
{ orderDetails.cart.map(item => ( )) }
Product Quantity Price
{orderDetails.name} {orderDetails.email} {orderDetails.address} {orderDetails.phonenumber}
) } export default OrderDetails
